original_text:
“If you have raced with men on foot, and they have wearied you,
    how will you compete with horses?
And if in a safe land you are so trusting,
    what will you do in the thicket of the Jordan?
korean_text: 만일 네가 보행자와 함께 달려도 피곤하면 어찌 능히 말과 경주하겠느냐 네가 평안한 땅에서는 무사하려니와 요단 강 물이 넘칠 때에는 어찌하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If you have raced with men on foot
how will you compete with horses?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 어떻게 말들과 경주할 수 있겠느냐?

sentences.original_text: And if in a safe land you are so trusting
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 평안한 땅에서 네가 그토록 안심하는데

sentences.original_text: what will you do in the thicket of the Jordan?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 요단의 흉악한 곳에서는 무엇을 하겠느냐?
